title: Sheffield made
creator_credit: John S. Green, Frank Green and Ace Films
brief_description: How the steelmakers of Sheffield, with their traditions of skill and craftsmanship, are producing special steels. Shows how these same traditions, backed by research and modern equipment, are meeting the demands of designers and engineers, in the aviation industry and the construction of atomic power stations.
